header.title: What my students and parents say
header.subtitle: Real results from IBDP, A Level and IGCSE students worldwide.

video.heading: Real students talking about their WSMath journey
video.subheading: Short clips from different students sharing how they improved with Winson’s coaching.

featured.name: Alice Gao (2022)
featured.quote: I had the great fortune of being tutored by Winson during my IBDP years. Winson's passion for tutoring is evident in every session. He pinpoints specific areas where I need assistance and tailors his instruction to address my challenges. His notes are clear, concise, and easy to grasp. One standout aspect was the wealth of past paper questions he provided, meticulously sorted by topics and years. I am truly grateful for his guidance.

featured.name: Bill Ting (2021)
featured.role: Edexcel IAL Math + Further Math — From F to A*
featured.quote: Winson老師擅長讓艱深乏味的內容變得有趣且易於理解。對於我的任何疑問，老師都會耐心解答，直至我明白。老師對每一堂課都有充分規劃與準備，並常自願延長課堂時間完成教學。課後他會精心挑選相關題目供我練習及鞏固，如課本題目或歷屆Past Paper，並整理專屬錯題本。老師通常會先親自解題，讓我觀察解題思路及了解評分要求。Winson不僅是一位專業而友善的老師，更像一位朋友，我非常感恩能遇到這位良師益友。

featured.name: Jason Yeung (2025)
featured.quote: Mr. Siu is the best math teacher I have ever had. His explanations, particularly for calculus, are outstanding. His resources are comprehensive, offering targeted exercises and past papers dating back to the 2000s. He was also a great motivator, encouraging me to complete past papers and homework when my own drive was low.

featured.name: Cissie Ching (2025)
featured.quote: Winson老师的教学方式以习题练习为主，不断加强记忆并深入了解知识点，课后亦会有相应笔记供学生复习。老师一直很用心，包括备课／考前准备等，性格热情，教课不死板而且认真，并量身定做往年习题、易错题以及薄弱知识点单元等。

carousel.name: James Chow (2024)
carousel.quote: He is an exceptional educator with a genuine passion for teaching and fostering young talent. What makes Siu Sir truly outstanding is his long-term commitment to my education. His dedication has been evident through the precise and thoughtful compilation of past paper questions, detailed booklets, and notes for every chapter we covered. Siu Sir's belief in me and his encouragement were pivotal. He was always willing to accommodate additional classes at short notice and generously took time to answer questions outside of our lessons. His explanations were clear, insightful, and tailored to my learning style.

carousel.name: Sharon Deng (2023)
carousel.quote: 我个人认为数学本身是一门实践大于理论，并需时刻保持手感的科目。因此我与Winson老师让学生直接实操Past Paper的教学方式十分契合，且迅速总结出Past Papers的做题方式；课上的比对作业以及改错环节使我更愿意在课后抽出时间学习这个科目。

carousel.name: Joy Angela Sun (2022)
carousel.university: The Chinese University of Hong Kong
carousel.quote: Winson’s teaching style is based on experience: his insistence on learning by practicing past papers is sensible and practical. He provides specific past paper questions for each topic separately, and his notes are very useful for final exam revisions. Winson is very patient and experienced. His assignments are based on each student’s ability and needs.

carousel.name: Cassie Luo (2023)
carousel.quote: Winson老师是一位满怀责任心的数学老师。他会在课堂中先带领我学习及总结单元知识，接下来将挑选合适的题目以供我练习。如果期间有任何不解，老师都会针对性地进行详细的讲解。一节课中70%时间学生做题；30%时间老师讲课，这是Winson老师独特的教学方式。Winson老师亦会在课后为我整理好Past Paper Booklet，以便我课后进行复习及巩固。

carousel.name: Vera Jing (2021)
carousel.quote: Winson was the first and only Math tutor who supervised me throughout my IBDP. We started regular tuition in 2019. He is patient, organized, and supportive, and his notes and revision material greatly help in exam conditions!
